statements: SELECT * FROM rental_payments;
SELECT payment_id, amount_paid FROM rental_payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT payment_id, amount_paid FROM rental_payments WHERE amount_paid > 100;
SELECT * FROM rental_payments ORDER BY payment_id DESC;
SELECT payment_id, transaction_id FROM rental_payments WHERE payment_method = 'Cash' ORDER BY amount_paid ASC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_method, transaction_id, amount_paid FROM rental_payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card'
SELECT payment_id, payment_method, transaction_id, amount_paid FROM rental_payments ORDER BY amount_paid DESC
SELECT * FROM rental_payments WHERE amount_paid > 1000 AND payment_method LIKE '%Cash%'
SELECT payment_method, SUM(amount_paid) AS total_amount FROM rental_payments GROUP BY payment_method ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT payment_id, transaction_id, amount_paid FROM rental_payments WHERE transaction_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM rental_payments;
SELECT payment_id, payment_method FROM rental_payments ORDER BY payment_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount_paid FROM rental_payments WHERE amount_paid > 100;
SELECT * FROM rentals WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY rental_date ASC;
SELECT rental_id, return_date, rented_by FROM rentals WHERE rental_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM rental_payments WHERE amount_paid > 100
SELECT payment_method, transaction_id, amount_paid FROM rental_payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card'
SELECT rental_id, rental_date, return_date FROM rentals WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY rental_date DESC
SELECT payment_id, payment_method, amount_paid FROM rental_payments WHERE amount_paid BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY payment_id ASC
SELECT * FROM rentals WHERE rented_by LIKE '%John%'
SELECT * FROM PaymentDetails;
SELECT payment_id, payment_method FROM PaymentDetails WHERE amount_paid > 100;
SELECT * FROM RentalDetails ORDER BY rent_start_date DESC;
SELECT rental_id, rent_start_date, rent_end_date FROM RentalDetails WHERE rent_end_date > '2022-09-01';
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, timestamp FROM TransactionLogs ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM PaymentDetails WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT payment_id, payment_method, amount_paid FROM PaymentDetails WHERE amount_paid > 1000;
SELECT rental_id, renter_id, rent_start_date, rent_end_date FROM RentalDetails WHERE rent_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_id, transaction_id, timestamp FROM TransactionLogs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM RentalDetails WHERE item_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND renter_id = 5 ORDER BY rent_start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM PaymentMethods;
SELECT payment_method_id, payment_method_name FROM PaymentMethods WHERE payment_method_id = '8f5b6be5-6490-4f61-9b59-8f8b50317fcc';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT rental_id, rental_date FROM Rentals WHERE rental_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY rental_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount_paid FROM Transactions WHERE amount_paid > 1000 ORDER BY amount_paid DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%@example.com';

SELECT Transactions.transaction_id, Rentals.rental_date, Customers.customer_name FROM Transactions JOIN Rentals ON Transactions.transaction_id = Rentals.transaction_id JOIN Customers ON Transactions.payment_method_id = Customers.customer_id;

SELECT payment_method_name, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM PaymentMethods JOIN Transactions ON PaymentMethods.payment_method_id = Transactions.payment_method_id GROUP BY payment_method_name;
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM rentals;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, amount_paid FROM rentals WHERE amount_paid > 100;
SELECT rental_id, payment_method, amount_paid FROM rentals ORDER BY amount_paid DESC;
SELECT method_name, method_id FROM payment_methods;
SELECT rental_id, payment_method, amount_paid FROM rentals;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT method_name, payment_amount FROM payment_methods JOIN payment_details ON payment_methods.method_id = payment_details.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN customers ON transactions.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, payment_method, amount_paid FROM customers JOIN rentals ON customers.customer_id = rentals.rental_id WHERE amount_paid > 100.00;
